about_the_game:
Game Overview

"99%" is a first-person survival horror puzzle game set in an eerie research facility.

The protagonist, having lost all memories, explores the twisted and terrifying environment in a desperate attempt to escape.

Story

You awaken in a dimly lit room within a dark facility.

All you hear are faint mechanical sounds echoing through the shadows.

You have no memory of why you are here or even where you are.

You must explore the closed-off facility, gathering records and remnants of past experiments, while confronting the lurking horrors.

Controls

  • Move: WASD keys

  • Run: Shift key

  • Interact: Left-click

  • Pause: ESC key

System

  • Save System: The game automatically saves at each chapter.

  • Endings: Different endings are available based on player choices.

Playtime

The average playtime for this game is between 40 to 60 minutes, varying based on the ending and the depth of exploration.

Streaming Guidelines

  • Permission: Streaming is allowed without restriction for individuals and organizations alike.

  • Monetization: Allowed only if using features provided by the video streaming platform.

  • Disclaimer: The developer holds no responsibility for any issues resulting from streaming this game.

  • Changes: These guidelines may change without prior notice.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be suitable for all ages or appropriate for viewing in a workplace setting. It includes frequent depictions of violence, gore, and other mature content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: "99%" is a first-person survival horror puzzle game set in an eerie research facility. The protagonist, having lost all memories, explores the twisted and terrifying environment in a desperate attempt to escape.
